001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.zeromq;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
005import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
007import org.bitcoinj.core.Block;
008import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
009import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.util.BlockUtil;
010
011import java.net.URI;
012
013import static java.lang.System.out;
014
015/**
016 * Sample Bitcoin ZMQ client
017 */
018public class SampleBitcoinZmqClient {
019
020    public static void main(String[] args) {
021        Network network = BitcoinNetwork.MAINNET;
022        String rpcUser = "";
023        String rpcPassword = "";
024        URI rpcUri = URI.create("http://localhost:8332");
025
026        try (RxBitcoinZmqService client = new RxBitcoinZmqService(network, rpcUri, rpcUser, rpcPassword)) {
027            // Subscribe to Blocks
028            Disposable disposable = client.blockPublisher()
029                    .subscribe(SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onBlock, SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onError);
030
031            // Subscribe to ChainTips
032            Disposable disposable2 = client.chainTipPublisher()
033                    .subscribe(SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onChainTip, SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onError);
034
035
036            // Blocking subscribe to Transactions (so main() doesn't finish)
037            client.transactionPublisher()
038                    .blockingSubscribe(SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onTx, SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onError);
039
040            disposable.dispose();
041        }
042    }
043
044    static void onBlock(Block block) {
045        out.println("Raw block");
046        out.printf("Block version: %s\n", block.getVersion());
047        out.printf("Raw Block: %s/%s containing %s transactions\n",
048                BlockUtil.blockHeightFromCoinbase(block),
049                block.getHash(),
050                block.getTransactions().size());
051
052    }
053
054    static void onChainTip(ChainTip tip) {
055        out.printf("Chain tip: %s/%s\n", tip.getHeight(), tip.getHash());
056    }
057
058    static void onTx(Transaction tx) {
059        out.printf("Raw Tx: %s, value: %s\n",
060                tx.getTxId(),
061                tx.getOutputSum().toPlainString());
062    }
063
064    static void onError(Throwable t) {
065        out.println("Error: " + t);
066    }
067
068}
